TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalClientSecuritySettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定本地客户端安全设置。

span.span: Specifies local client security settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含 （和从它派生的类）用于生成安全通道的本地安全设置。This class contains the local security settings used by the (and classes derived from it) to build the security channel. 这些设置是客户端的本地设置，不能根据服务的安全策略来确定。These settings are local to the client and are not determined from the service's security policy. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 类。This example shows how to use the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CookieRenewalThresholdPercentage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CookieRenewalThresholdPercentage : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置续订安全对话 Cookie 的阈值百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the threshold percentage for renewal of secure conversation cookies.

value.span: 续订安全对话 Cookie 的阈值百分比。

span.span: The threshold percentage for renewing secure conversation cookies.

value.span: 默认值为 60%。

span.span: The default is 60 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端会缓存安全对话 Cookie，当缓存的 Cookie 即将到期时，客户端会从服务自动获取一个新的 Cookie。The client caches secure conversation cookies and when a cached cookie is going to expire in the near future, the client automatically gets a new cookie from the service. 此属性值确定在获取新 Cookie 之前，必须经过的已缓存 Cookie 有效期的百分比。The value of this property determines what percentage of the cached cookie's validity period must be over before getting a new cookie. 例如，如果该属性值为 60，且客户端具有一个有效期为 100 分钟的安全会话 Cookie，则它会重用该缓存的 Cookie 60 分钟，此后它会从服务获取一个新 Cookie。For example, if the value of this property is 60, and the client has a secure conversation cookie that is valid for 100 minutes, it reuses the cached cookie for 60 minutes, after which it gets a new cookie from the service. ## Examples 此示例演示如何设置 `CookieRenewalThresholdPercentage` 成员：This example shows how to set the `CookieRenewalThresholdPercentage` member. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#3)]

exception.span: 该属性使用 设置为一个小于 0 或大于 100 的值。

span.span: The property is to a value less than 0 or greater than 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于验证正在与客户端通道通信的远程终结点是否与该通道指向的 中指定的标识相匹配。This property is used to verify that the remote endpoint that the client channel is communicating with matches the identity specified in the that the channel is targeted for. ## Examples 此示例演示如何返回该抽象类的实现的实例。This example shows how to return an instance of an implementation of the abstract class. member this.MaxClockSkew : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置通信双方的系统时钟之间允许的最大时间差异。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.

value.span: 一个 ，表示进行通信双方的系统时钟之间允许的最大时间差异。

span.span: A that represents the maximum allowable time difference between the system clocks of the two parties that are communicating.

value.span: 默认值为 5 分钟。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个系统间的系统时钟差异超过此属性中指定的值，这两个系统间的消息将被拒绝。Messages between systems whose clocks' difference exceeds the value specified in this property are rejected. 此属性与消息时间戳验证和 属性一起使用。This property is used in conjunction with the message time stamp verification and the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 设置最大时钟偏差](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-set-a-max-clock-skew.md)。For more information, see [How to: Set a Max Clock Skew](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-set-a-max-clock-skew.md). ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取 值。This example shows how to get the value. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#6)]

exception.span: 此属性使用 设置为一个小于 0 的值。

span.span: The property is to a value less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReconnectTransportOnFailure { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ReconnectTransportOnFailure : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在传输失败后安全会话是否尝试重新连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures.

value.span: 如果在传输失败后安全会话尝试重新连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标志设置为 `true`，则客户端将尝试通过多个传输连接发送对应于单个安全会话的消息。If this flag is set to `true`, the client tries to send messages that correspond to a single security session over multiple transport connections. 如果上一个连接失败，它将建立新的传输连接。It establishes a new transport connection if the previous connection fails. 这在使用安全 WS-ReliableMessaging 的情况下很有用，因为客户端要求会话容忍瞬态传输故障。This is useful in the case of secure WS-ReliableMessaging because the client requires the session to tolerate transient transport failures. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取一个指示在传输失败后安全会话是否尝试重新连接的值。This example shows how to get a value that indicates whether security sessions attempt to reconnect after transport failures. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#8)]

member this.ReplayCacheSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于重播检测的缓存 Nonce 的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of cached nonces used for replay detection.

value.span: 用于重播检测的缓存 Nonce 的数目。

span.span: The number of cached nonces used for replay detection.
The default is 900000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A *nonce*通常是一个"只用一次"，，则会在身份验证协议中的使用以确保旧的通信不能在攻击中使用通过重播一个随机数。A *nonce* is a "number used once", often a random number used in an authentication protocol to ensure that old communications cannot be used in an attack by using replays. 如果超过 Nonce 计数，则将拒绝传入的消息并引发 。If the nonce count is exceeded, the incoming message is rejected and a is thrown. 旧 Nonce 将被及时移除。Old nonces are removed in a timely manner. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取用于重播检测的缓存 Nonce 的数目。This example shows how to get the number of cached nonces to use for replay detection. [!code-csharp[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[S_UELocalClientSecuritySettings#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelocalclientsecuritysettings/vb/program.vb#9)]

span.span: A that represents the maximum time that a message nonce is valid.

value.span: 默认值为 5 分钟。

span.span: The default is five minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A *nonce*通常是一个"只用一次"，，则会在身份验证协议中的使用以确保旧的通信不能在攻击中使用通过重播一个随机数。A *nonce* is a "number used once", often a random number used in an authentication protocol to ensure that old communications cannot be used in an attack by using replays. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取此属性。This example shows how to get this property. span.span: Gets or sets the time span after which the initiator renews the key for the security session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均适用：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有客户端凭据类型。All client credential types for and . - 如果[ \ 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已启用。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled. - 如果[ \ 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在与 = `true`或 = `true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均不适用：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 对于 。For . - 对于 。For . - 如果[ \ 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在与 = `true`或任何属性设置为`true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取此属性。This example shows how to get this property. member this.SessionKeyRolloverInterval : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个时间间隔，这段时间间隔内上一个会话密钥在密钥续订期间对传入的消息有效。

span.span: Gets or sets the time interval for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages during a key renewal.

value.span: 一个表示时间间隔的 ，这段时间间隔内上一个会话密钥在密钥续订后对传入的消息有效。

span.span: A that represents the time interval for which the previous session key is valid on incoming messages after a key renewal.

value.span: 默认值为 5 分钟。

span.span: The default is 5 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥续订后，客户端和服务器应始终使用最新的可用密钥发送消息。After key renewal, the client and the server should always send messages using the most current available key. 在翻转时间到期前，双方都可以接受以上一个会话密钥加密的传入消息。Both parties can accept incoming messages secured with the previous session key until the rollover time expires. 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均适用：Session settings such as this one are applicable under any of the following conditions: - 和 的所有客户端凭据类型。All client credential types for and . - 如果[ \ 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)已启用。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is enabled. - 如果[ \ 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在与 = `true`或 = `true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or = `true`. 诸如此类的会话设置在以下任何条件下均不适用：Session settings such as this one are not applicable under any of the following conditions: - 对于 。For . - 对于 。For . - 如果[ \ 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b)未启用，在与 = `true`或任何属性设置为`true`。If [\ element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9c93818a-7dfa-43d5-b3a1-1aafccf3a00b) is not enabled, on with = `true` or with none of the properties set to `true`. ## Examples 此示例演示如何获取此属性。This example shows how to get this property.
